job.title: Job Postings
job.subtitle: The Next Step in Your Career

form.title: Apply
form.sub2: If you would like to make a general application please feel free to contact us directly.

employer.title: Employer Services
employer.subtitle: We offer tailored solutions to fit your diverse hiring needs. Whether you're a hustling startup or a seasoned company, we've got the skills and flexibility to get you where you need to be.

parts.title: Contingency Based Staffing Service
parts.copy: Our contingency-based staffing services offer customized solutions on an as-needed basis. No strings attached, just access our expertise when you need it most. Whether your building out a new team or hiring a star player to support your company's growth, weâ€™ve got you covered! We'll work closely with you to develop a plan that meets your needs, ensuring you have the right people in place to build strong and successful teams.

parts.title: Fractional People Operations and Talent Acquisition Support Service
parts.copy: Our Fraction People Ops and TA Support Services offer comprehensive solutions for companies requiring flexible or supplementary internal TA and operational support in staffing. We offer a suite of services tailored to help your company not only attract the best talent but keep them motivated and engaged. We help you develop effective hiring processes, onboarding strategies, and retention plans to nurture new hires and retain your existing talent.

applicant.title: Applicant Services
applicant.subtitle1: Looking to boost your chances of landing your dream job?
applicant.subtitle2: We offer a suite of applicant services designed to equip you with the tools and guidance you need to stand out in the job market.

parts.title: Resume Review
parts.copy: Our resume review service provides a virtual review session to help you present your skills and experience in the best possible light. We offer a thorough review of your resume, including editing, formatting, and content recommendations. With our expert guidance, your resume will showcase your strengths and achievements effectively.

parts.title: Career Consultation
parts.copy: For those seeking personalized guidance and advice, our career consultation service offers a virtual session to help you identify your strengths, interests, and career goals. We provide personalized guidance and advice to help you determine a clear career roadmap. With our support, you'll be well-equipped to achieve your career aspirations.

parts.title: Interview Preparation
parts.copy: Our interview preparation service offers a virtual session with a professional interviewer, who will provide valuable feedback and coaching, as well as a mock interview to help you feel confident for your upcoming interview. With our guidance, you'll be able to ace your interviews and land the job you deserve.
